document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Smiling </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">back </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">Coronation </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">May </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Luxury </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">On </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Heads </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">started </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">Being's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Peasantry </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Recognizing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">Procession </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Ones </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">former </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">knew </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Ourselves </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">also </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">dusty </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">Centuries </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">ago </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">Triumph </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Conviction </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">how </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">many </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">Stimulated </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">Contrast </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Unto </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">Misery </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Smiling back from coronation
